price: Alipo waambia ndugu yao Swaleh: Je! Hamumchimngu?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ صَٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Mtume! Watajie watu wako, wakati ule kina Thamud walipo ambiwa na ndugu yao kwa uzao na uwananchi, si kwa dini, Swaleh: Hamumwogopi Mwenyezi Mungu, mkamuaabudu Yeye tu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum ṣāliḥun alā tattaqūna
